name: Georgia Tech's 3D User Interface class
body:
### Welcome to the 3D UI Class

This organization is a launchpad for the yearly class site, but will eventually contain more resources. Each of the instances of the class is in its own github organization, and uses Github Classroom for assignments.

- CS 4803/8803-3DU [Spring 2020](https://3dui-class-s20.github.io) 
- CS 4803/8803-3DU [Fall 2020](https://3dui-class-f20.github.io) 

I expect the class will be taught once per year.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
